name: Midwalker #1
description:
Years after a serious injury that almost cost him his life, Joshua Fischer discovers he has the remarkable ability to cross partway into the ethereal realm whereby he is enveloped in, and can control, amazing energies. But the euphoric feeling associated with crossing over turns out to be far more addictive than he ever anticipated. Can he overcome the paralyzing euphoria that accompanies his amazing transformation before Satan’s warrior demon destroys him? 

Story:  Ben Gerard Filipiak
Pencils & Inks:  Mike Shoyket 
Colors: Scott Reed 
Cover By: Mike Shoyket & Scott Reed

Note: All trade paperbacks and comic books ship via Media Mail, unless ordered with a non-book item.

name: Midwalker #2
description:
Growtesque has risen and begins his hunt for the new and untested Midwalker. His presence in Tampa catches the attention of Rebecca Chase, whose need for a groundbreaking news story forces her to engage in a hunt of her own. Meanwhile, Josh tests his ability to cross over into the afterlife, unknowingly signaling his position to the battle-hungry Growtesque!

Story: Ben Gerard Filipiak 
Pencils & Inks: Mike Shoyket 
Colors: Scott Reed 
Cover By: Mike Shoyket & Scott Reed

Note: All trade paperbacks and comic books ship via Media Mail, unless ordered with a non-book item.

name: Midwalker #3
description:
Joshua finds himself paralyzed by his addiction to the euphoria he feels while crossing into the afterlife; while Rebecca’s coverage of the Bayshore Beast places her in the center of the action as Growtesque closes in!

Story: Ben Gerard Filipiak 
Pencils & Inks: Mike Shoyket 
Colors: Scott Reed 
Cover By: Mike Shoyket & Scott Reed

Note: All trade paperbacks and comic books ship via Media Mail, unless ordered with a non-book item.

name: Maniacal Smile: Omnibus
description:
In this definitive collection, follow The Maniacal Smile's rise from high school debauchery, to the Independent comic book sensation it is now. Against our better judgment, because the fans keep asking for it, you can see the first incarnations of the smiley faced hero you've come to know and love. Check out Smiley from his first drawing all the way to the present time in this giant serving of immaturity. 

You’ll get the original high school oversized issues, first twelve issues printed and distributed locally in the Florida market, including the lost thirteenth issue in print for the first time ever! If that wasn't enough, we also crammed in the four issues done under Pandamonium Press!, that launched Smiley into brand new directions. Original art and majority of scripting done by creator/artist Rob Rhine, better written scripting towards the end by writer Mike Foss and foreword by independent comic creator Bill Maus. 

A must have for any fan of comics, especially comics about Super Irritable Bowel Syndrome.

Written by: Rob Rhine & Mike Foss
Illustrations: Rob Rhine
Black & White, 464 Pages
ISBN: 978-0-9839086-0-9

Note: All trade paperbacks and comic books ship via Media Mail, unless ordered with a non-book item.

name: Maniacal Smile: Guts of a Hero
description:
Born with super irritable bowel syndrome, Alex McClendon uses his powers to protect the city of Utopia. And when he dons The Maniacal Smile suit, you can be sure that there'll be a splatter of action. Keeping Alex from just farting around with his powers are his ex-hero Uncle Rich and his lab assistant, the enigmatic E.V.I.L. Robot. But not everyone knows that Alex is the Maniacal Smile. His best friends Puffy and Nikki never seem to spend enough time with the ever-disappearing Alex. Teenage angst, girl problems, and city destroying threats are all a day in the life of THE MANIACAL SMILE!

After a summer of training, Alex is ready to show the city of Utopia that he has what it takes to be its protector as The Maniacal Smile! While preparing for the city hero tryouts, he stumbles across a new player in town with his own plans for Utopia. Will Alex be ready for the audition in time? Will he be able to stop this powerful new foe? Will he, for the love of all that’s decent, spray some air-freshener? This first-ever Maniacal Smile trade paperback includes the Guts of a Hero story, the sold-out negative one issue and the crossover issue with Twisted Pixel Games, guest starring Captain Smiley from the X-Box Live game, Comic Jumper.

Story: Mike Foss
Illustrations: Rob Rhine
Color, 96 Pages
ISBN: 978-0-9839086-2-3

Note: All trade paperbacks and comic books ship via Media Mail, unless ordered with a non-book item.

name: Redneck Red: Roar of the Swamp
description:
Gifted with incredible powers after drinking a batch of radioactive moonshine, the Everglades local known only as Red becomes the swamp's defender against evil witches and other twisted creatures that you could only find deep in the dark and deadly swamp. In this ground breaking story, Red is hunted by Orchid Industries, an evil corporation with enough resources to reach deep into the swamp. Don't miss the story that launched the world's first radioactive redneck!

Story: Ben Filipiak & Pat Batton
Illustrations: Scott Reed
Cover: Don Hillsman II & Scott Reed
Color, 96 Pages
ISBN: 978-0-9839086-1-6

Note: All trade paperbacks and comic books ship via Media Mail, unless ordered with a non-book item.

name: Guts of a Hero Board Game
description:
The Maniacal Smile eagerly swallowed Champanzee’s Deuce Bomb in an effort to neutralize it, without realizing it was covered in Tristeelium, a substance even Smiley cannot digest. Now a miniaturized Remote Smiley, Quadriplegic Man, Champanzee, and E.V.I.L. Robot race through Smiley’s innards to get to the bomb first. Will Smiley or Quad reach the bomb and defuse it before Champ or E.V.I.L. Robot can detonate it? It takes the guts of a hero to try in this exciting new board game! 

Note: Board game orders are shipped via Priority Mail.

name: Guts of a Hero: Action Card Expansion Pack Series 1
description:
Take the heroic game of intestinal justice to an entirely new level of insanity with the Action Card Expansion Pack.  

Did you think the wild actions of the basic game were unbelievable?  You'll be blown away by the wild swings in position that result from these additional cards.  Play them on there own, or in addition to the basic card set, to make the trip through Smiley's intestines a radically unpredictable journey.

What's that?  Not crazy enough?  Then use the included specialty dice and risk the chance of pulling not one, but two action cards in a single roll.  You could go from one step away from the bomb to right back into the stomach if you aren't strategic with your Force Fields.

Tested at the Orlando Mega Con with rave reviews, this expansion pack is sure to make playing Guts of a Hero an unforgettable event!

Contents include:
32 Sweet Donkey Action Cards
32 Put Some Stank On It Action Cards
2 Specialty Dice (each with the numbers 1-5 and a card pull face)

Note: Expansion Pack orders are shipped via First-Class Mail, unless ordered with additional items.

name: Guts of a Hero: Character Expansion Pack Series 1
description:
If you thought playing Guts of a Hero was fun with four players, try it with six, using the Breakneck Basilisk Vs Atomic Jellyfish Character Expansion Pack. Play as six individuals or team up as three good guys and three bad guys to race to the Tristeelium bomb before it explodes!

Use the included 8-sided die to completely change the game's pace and zip through Smiley's intestines faster than you ever thought possible.  But be careful, you may find yourself moving backward just as fast as you move ahead.

Contents include:
Breakneck Basilisk Playing Piece
Atomic Jellyfish Playing Piece
Four Avoid One Force Field Cards
Four Pull Extra Force Field Cards
8-sided Die

Note: Expansion Pack orders are shipped via First-Class Mail, unless ordered with additional items.

name: Guts of a Hero: Character Expansion Pack Series 2
description:
Why play Guts of a Hero with only four players when you can include your pals and play with six or even eight characters by adding character expansion packs!

With this pack, become the mysterious hero, Blue Manta, as you race through Smiley's guts to reach the Tristeelium covered Deuce Bomb!  Or, if bad guys are your thing, become the evil Catmandoo and reach the bomb first.

To really mix things up, completely change the gameplay experience with the included specialty die.  On it, you'll find the numbers one through four, and Sweet Donkey and Put Some Stank On It card pull faces.  You'll never know what to expect when you roll the die with this expansion pack!

Contents include:
Blue Manta Playing Piece
Catmandoo Playing Piece
Four Avoid One Force Field Cards
Four Pull Extra Force Field Cards
Specialty Die (Includes the numbers one through four, and Sweet Donkey and Put Some Stank On It card pull faces.)

Note: Expansion Pack orders are shipped via First-Class Mail, unless ordered with additional items.

name: Red Maniacal Smile Iconic Head T-Shirt
description:
What better way to say you're a Smiley fan than with the classic Maniacal Smile Iconic Head T-Shirt!  

Fabric is 5.6oz 50% Cotton/50% Polyester. Seamless collar, taped neck & shoulders, double needle throughout. "DryBlend" fabric wicks moisture away from the body.

Other colors available.

Note: Single shirt orders are shipped via First-Class Mail. Orders with multiple shirts or a combination of shirts and other items will ship via Priority Mail.

name: Maniacal Smile: A Tale of Two Smileys
description:
From the video game screen to the printed page, Fierce Comics is proud to present in association with Twisted Pixel Games, Smiley's first crossover! In this action packed one shot, The Maniacal Smile comes rotund face to rotund face with Captain Smiley. For the first time ever in print Captain smiley graces the pages of the world's first smiley faced hero on his own turf; the city of Utopia! Bowel blasting action meets gun toting, cape wearing kick assery in "The tale of two Smileys". Also look for The Maniacal smile's first pixelated appearance when you play "Comic Jumper: The adventures Of Captain Smiley."

Story: Mike Foss
Illustrations: Rob Rhine
Letters: Ben Filipiak 

Note: All trade paperbacks and comic books ship via Media Mail, unless ordered with a non-book item.

name: Maniacal Smile #1
description:
After a summer of training, Alex is ready to show the city of Utopia that he’s got what it takes to be its protector as The Maniacal Smile! While preparing for the city hero tryouts, he stumbles across a new player in town with his own plans for Utopia. Will Alex be ready for the audition in time? Will he be able to stop this powerful new foe? Will he, for the love of all that’s decent, spray some air-freshener?! An explosive, toilet ruining first issue presented by Fierce Comics!

Born with super irritable bowel syndrome, Alex McClendon uses his powers to protect the city of Utopia. And when he dons The Maniacal Smile suit, you can be sure that there'll be a splatter of action. Keeping Alex from just farting around with his powers are his ex-hero Uncle Rich and his lab assistant the enigmatic E.V.I.L. Robot. But not everyone knows that Alex is the Maniacal Smile. His best friends Puffy, who owns a comic book shop, and Nikki can never seem to spend any time with the ever-disappearing Alex. Teenage angst, girl problems, and city destroying threats are all a day in the life of THE MANIACAL SMILE!

Story: Mike Foss
Illustrations: Rob Rhine
Letters: Ben Filipiak 

Note: All trade paperbacks and comic books ship via Media Mail, unless ordered with a non-book item.

name: Maniacal Smile #2
description:
The hero tryouts are underway and The Maniacal Smile has to compete with other hero hopefuls. Meanwhile, Uncle Rich hatches a plan to help Alex answer the question of who the mysterious powerhouse is that keeps threatening the city. Can Smiley win the competition and become the city’s defender? Or will he be crushed under the might of the CHAMPANZEE?

Born with super irritable bowel syndrome, Alex McClendon uses his powers to protect the city of Utopia. And when he dons The Maniacal Smile suit, you can be sure that there'll be a splatter of action. Keeping Alex from just farting around with his powers are his ex-hero Uncle Rich and his lab assistant the enigmatic E.V.I.L. Robot. But not everyone knows that Alex is the Maniacal Smile. Story: Mike Foss
Illustrations: Rob Rhine
Letters: Ben Filipiak 

Note: All trade paperbacks and comic books ship via Media Mail, unless ordered with a non-book item.

Story: Mike Foss
Illustrations: Rob Rhine
Letters: Ben Filipiak 

Note: All trade paperbacks and comic books ship via Media Mail, unless ordered with a non-book item.

name: Maniacal Smile #4
description:
Utopia's reservist hero, The Maniacal Smile, is having a really bad day. A group of Eco-terrorists attack the "Aqueous" sea lab as Alex's Uncle Rich is donating the remaining formula that gave him super appendage powers as the hero Limbs. To make matters worse a new crime-fighter makes his aquatic debut. Then things get really bad. Our hero gets "The Blues", part one of two.

Born with super irritable bowel syndrome, Alex McClendon uses his powers to protect the city of Utopia. And when he dons The Maniacal Smile suit, you can be sure that there'll be a splatter of action. Keeping Alex from just farting around with his powers are his ex-hero Uncle Rich and his lab assistant the enigmatic E.V.I.L. Robot. But not everyone knows that Alex is the Maniacal Smile. Story: Mike Foss
Illustrations: Rob Rhine
Letters: Pat Batton

Note: All trade paperbacks and comic books ship via Media Mail, unless ordered with a non-book item.

name: Redneck Red #1
description:
Gifted with incredible powers after drinking a batch of radioactive moonshine, the Everglades local known only as Red becomes the defender of the swamp as he faces evil swamp witches, undead bog treaders and other twisted creatures that you could only find deep in the dark and deadly swamp.

Story: Ben Filipiak & Pat Batton 
Illustrations: Scott Reed 
Letters: Ben Filipiak 
Cover By: Don Hillsman II & Scott Reed

Note: All trade paperbacks and comic books ship via Media Mail, unless ordered with a non-book item.

name: Redneck Red #2
description:
Deep within the Orchid Industries building, Red describes the incredible events leading to his remarkable transformation. Will he find the help he needs to escape Doctor Driers horrifying exploratory surgery?

Story: Ben Filipiak & Pat Batton 
Illustrations: Scott Reed 
Letters: Ben Filipiak 
Cover By: Don Hillsman II & Rob Richardson

Note: All trade paperbacks and comic books ship via Media Mail, unless ordered with a non-book item.

name: Redneck Red #3
description:
Red faces his greatest challenge as he encounters the evil Swamp Witch. Will his amazing powers be enough to overcome this seemingly insurmountable challenge?

Story: Ben Filipiak & Pat Batton 
Illustrations: Scott Reed 
Letters: Ben Filipiak 
Cover By: Karsten Klintzsch & Scott Reed

Note: All trade paperbacks and comic books ship via Media Mail, unless ordered with a non-book item.

name: Redneck Red #4
description:
It's the exciting conclusion to Roar of the Swamp! The evil Swamp Witch is on the rampage, the Orchid Building is on fire, and Red and the Swamp Ape are stuck in the lower labs with no way out. Will this be the end of our radioactive redneck and his savage companion? You won’t believe who rises to power in this exciting issue!

Story: Ben Filipiak & Pat Batton 
Illustrations: Scott Reed 
Letters: Ben Filipiak 
Cover By: Don Hillsman II & Scott Reed

Note: All trade paperbacks and comic books ship via Media Mail, unless ordered with a non-book item.
